entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
